Global.name: Felipe Moreno
Global.keywords: Front-End Developer, Frontend Developer, Front End Developer, Front-End Development, Frontend Development, Front End Development, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Angular, LitElement, Web Components, Node.js, Next.js, Redux, Unit testing (Jest, React testing, Jasmine, angular testing), Git, SCRUM, BEM, CSS, HTML5, SASS, Material, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express.js, Firebase, Figma, Jira

About.title: About Me
About.description: Frontend Developer with 4 years of professional experience in the banking and corporate sectors, specialized in building scalable and secure web applications using Next.js, Angular, React, LitElement and CELLS. Skilled in agile methodologies (SCRUM), version control with Git, and continuous integration/deployment practices (CI/CD).

experience.title: Indra
experience.achievedObjective:
Development of web components focused on improving customer self-service.
Implementation of unit and E2E tests with frameworks such as Chai, Cucumber, Jasmine, and Jest.
Automation of integration and deployment flows with Jenkins, Docker, GitHub Enterprise, applying agile methodologies (SCRUM, Gitflow).
CELLS and Secure Development certified, applying best practices from design to production.

experience.title: Endava
experience.achievedObjective: Collaborated on the development of a customer management platform for CoignCard, using JavaScript, React, Redux, React Router, improving operational efficiency and optimizing user experience.

experience.title: Sophos Solutions
experience.achievedObjective: Worked with the team to develop a web application for Tuya S.A., enabling automatic credit approvals. The frontend was built with TypeScript, Angular, HTML5 and CSS3.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.description: My passion lies in bringing captivating and user-friendly digital experiences to life. As a frontend developer, I focus on crafting interactive and responsive interfaces that blend technical prowess with compelling design. My portfolio reflects my commitment to excellence in web development, showcasing projects where creativity meets functionality to deliver memorable web experiences. From implementing responsive designs to optimizing performance, my goal is to leverage the latest technologies and standards to drive impactful and immersive projects that delight users and effectively solve challenges.
